nodes.text: Flirron were avian beasts native to the planet Onderon. Their dazzling patterns were considered by many scientists to be a form of visual communication between each other. By 3627 BBY, flirron were so popular among Onderon's populace that citizens of Iziz frequently viewed them from the city.
Flirron appear in the sixth expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, called Onslaught, which was released in 2019. Flirron can be obtained as player pets.
